content: André Danican Philidor used to play three games at the same time, two blindly and one looking at the board. Diderot and D'Alembert cited it in the Encyclopedia as "one of the most phenomenal manifestations of the human mind".
translations: ita:André Danican Philidor giocava tre partite allo stesso tempo, due alla cieca e una guardando la scacchiera. Diderot e D'
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
